verses.kjv: And David assembled all the princes of Israel, the princes of the tribes, and the captains of the companies that ministered to the king by course, and the captains over the thousands, and captains over the hundreds, and the stewards over all the substance and possession of the king, and of his sons, with the officers, and with the mighty men, and with all the valiant men, unto Jerusalem.
verses.ct: David gathered all of Israel's leaders in Jerusalem — the tribal chiefs, the commanders of the divisions that served the king in rotation, the officers over units of 1,000 and of 100, the managers of all the king's property and livestock and his sons' property, along with the court officials, the elite warriors, and every capable fighting man.

verses.kjv: Then David the king stood up upon his feet, and said, Hear me, my brethren, and my people: As for me, I had in mine heart to build an house of rest for the ark of the covenant of the LORD, and for the footstool of our God, and had made ready for the building:
verses.ct: Then King David rose to his feet and said, "Listen to me, my brothers and my people. I had my heart set on building a permanent home for the ark of the LORD's covenant, a resting place for the footstool of our God, and I made preparations for the construction.

verses.kjv: But God said unto me, Thou shalt not build an house for my name, because thou hast been a man of war, and hast shed blood.
verses.ct: "But God told me, 'You will not build a house for my name, because you have been a warrior and have spilled blood.'

verses.kjv: Howbeit the LORD God of Israel chose me before all the house of my father to be king over Israel for ever: for he hath chosen Judah to be the ruler; and of the house of Judah, the house of my father; and among the sons of my father he liked me to make me king over all Israel:
verses.ct: "Yet the LORD, the God of Israel, selected me from my entire father's family to be king over Israel permanently. He chose Judah as the leading tribe, and from Judah he chose my father's family, and from among my father's sons he was pleased to make me king over all of Israel.

verses.kjv: And of all my sons, (for the LORD hath given me many sons,) he hath chosen Solomon my son to sit upon the throne of the kingdom of the LORD over Israel.
verses.ct: "Out of all my sons — and the LORD has given me many — he selected my son Solomon to sit on the throne of the LORD's kingdom over Israel.

verses.kjv: And he said unto me, Solomon thy son, he shall build my house and my courts: for I have chosen him to be my son, and I will be his father.
verses.ct: "He told me, 'Your son Solomon is the one who will build my house and my courtyards, because I have chosen him as my son, and I will be his father.

verses.kjv: Moreover I will establish his kingdom for ever, if he be constant to do my commandments and my judgments, as at this day.
verses.ct: "I will make his kingdom last forever, if he remains committed to carrying out my commands and my laws, just as he does today.'

verses.kjv: Now therefore in the sight of all Israel the congregation of the LORD, and in the audience of our God, keep and seek for all the commandments of the LORD your God: that ye may possess this good land, and leave it for an inheritance for your children after you for ever.
verses.ct: "So now, in front of all Israel — the LORD's assembly — and with our God listening, carefully follow and pursue every command of the LORD your God. That way you will continue to possess this good land and pass it down as an inheritance to your descendants forever.

verses.kjv: And thou, Solomon my son, know thou the God of thy father, and serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind: for the LORD searcheth all hearts, and understandeth all the imaginations of the thoughts: if thou seek him, he will be found of thee; but if thou forsake him, he will cast thee off for ever.
verses.ct: "And you, Solomon my son, get to know the God of your father and serve him with a completely devoted heart and a willing spirit, because the LORD examines every heart and understands every thought and intention. If you seek him, he will let you find him. But if you abandon him, he will reject you permanently.

verses.kjv: Take heed now; for the LORD hath chosen thee to build an house for the sanctuary: be strong, and do it.
verses.ct: "Pay attention now — the LORD has chosen you to build a house as his sanctuary. Be strong and get it done."

verses.kjv: Then David gave to Solomon his son the pattern of the porch, and of the houses thereof, and of the treasuries thereof, and of the upper chambers thereof, and of the inner parlours thereof, and of the place of the mercy seat,
verses.ct: Then David gave his son Solomon the plans for the entrance hall, the surrounding rooms, the storerooms, the upper rooms, the inner chambers, and the room for the mercy seat.

verses.kjv: And the pattern of all that he had by the spirit, of the courts of the house of the LORD, and of all the chambers round about, of the treasuries of the house of God, and of the treasuries of the dedicated things:
verses.ct: He also gave him the plans for everything the Spirit had revealed to him: the courtyards of the LORD's house, all the surrounding rooms, the treasuries of God's house, and the treasuries for the dedicated offerings.

verses.kjv: Also for the courses of the priests and the Levites, and for all the work of the service of the house of the LORD, and for all the vessels of service in the house of the LORD.
verses.ct: He included instructions for the rotating divisions of the priests and Levites, for all the work involved in serving at the LORD's house, and for every item used in the service of the LORD's house.

verses.kjv: He gave of gold by weight for things of gold, for all instruments of all manner of service; silver also for all instruments of silver by weight, for all instruments of every kind of service:
verses.ct: He specified the weight of gold for every gold item used in each type of service, and the weight of silver for every silver item used in each type of service.

verses.kjv: Even the weight for the candlesticks of gold, and for their lamps of gold, by weight for every candlestick, and for the lamps thereof: and for the candlesticks of silver by weight, both for the candlestick, and also for the lamps thereof, according to the use of every candlestick.
verses.ct: He gave the exact weight for the gold lampstands and their gold lamps — the weight for each lampstand and its lamps — and for the silver lampstands, the weight for each lampstand and its lamps, based on how each one would be used.

verses.kjv: And by weight he gave gold for the tables of shewbread, for every table; and likewise silver for the tables of silver:
verses.ct: He specified the weight of gold for each table that held the sacred bread, and likewise the silver for the silver tables.

verses.kjv: Also pure gold for the fleshhooks, and the bowls, and the cups: and for the golden basons he gave gold by weight for every bason; and likewise silver by weight for every bason of silver:
verses.ct: He also gave specifications for the forks, bowls, and cups of pure gold, and the weight of gold for each gold basin, and the weight of silver for each silver basin.

verses.kjv: And for the altar of incense refined gold by weight; and gold for the pattern of the chariot of the cherubims, that spread out their wings, and covered the ark of the covenant of the LORD.
verses.ct: He specified the weight of refined gold for the incense altar, and gold for the design of the chariot — the cherubim that spread their wings and covered the ark of the LORD's covenant.

verses.kjv: All this, said David, the LORD made me understand in writing by his hand upon me, even all the works of this pattern.
verses.ct: "The LORD gave me understanding of all this through what he wrote by his hand guiding me," David said, "every detail of these plans."

verses.kjv: And David said to Solomon his son, Be strong and of good courage, and do it: fear not, nor be dismayed: for the LORD God, even my God, will be with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee, until thou hast finished all the work for the service of the house of the LORD.
verses.ct: Then David told his son Solomon, "Be strong, be courageous, and get it done. Don't be afraid or discouraged, because the LORD God — my God — will be with you. He won't let you down or abandon you until every bit of work for the service of the LORD's house is completed.

verses.kjv: And, behold, the courses of the priests and the Levites, even they shall be with thee for all the service of the house of God: and there shall be with thee for all manner of workmanship every willing skilful man, for any manner of service: also the princes and all the people will be wholly at thy commandment.
verses.ct: "Look, the divisions of priests and Levites are ready to help you with all the service of God's house. Every skilled and willing craftsman will be available to you for every kind of work. The leaders and all the people are completely at your command."
